entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -7.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 90 gusting to 110 through mainland inlets and valleys early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 near midnight except 70 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
